item.title: Doing research as a student: tips and tricks
item.description:
Title: Doing research as a student: tips and tricks

Speaker: Giacomo Micheli

Date: Thursday, July 23rd

Time: 2:00pm

Abstract: In this talk I will first explain how the publication process works. Then, I will go through some advice to do research as a student. In particular:

  • some of the methods I found most effective when I was doing independent research as a student.
  • some general advice related to the process of submitting a paper to a journal.

Link to Zoom meeting: https://zoom.us/j/95032330155
